thread.title: No pet-friendly rooms at the inn after reservation made

author: Christopher Elliott
title: No pet-friendly rooms at the inn after reservation made
text: Q:Iâ€™m trying to resolve an error made by an Expedia booking agent with whom I spoke on the phone. I recently called Expedia to book two rooms at a Best Western in Cody, Wyo. I would book the rooms only if they allowed pets.
